doc:
André Liabel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andr%C3%A9_Liabel 0 André Liabel was a French actor, film director and screenwriter. André Liabel began his career as comedian by working full-time as an actor for the cinematographic compagny Laboratoires Éclair which had just opened its new studios at Épinay-sur-Seine in 1908. He performed in more than sixty films until 1933. He also was assistant director. André_Liabel was a_French_actor , film_director_and_screenwriter . André_Liabel began his_career as comedian by working full-time as an_actor for the_cinematographic_compagny_Laboratoires_Éclair which had_just_opened its_new_studios at Épinay-sur-Seine in 1908 . He performed in more_than_sixty_films until 1933 . He also was assistant_director .
